desc.p: Specifies the ID of CATEG.ENTRY records with an ACCOUNTING.DATE and updated to Post Closing (PC) Database. The Year and Month in the ID of the record corresponds to that of the earliest PC Database updated by the listed CATEG.ENTRY records.
System updated field. No input allowed.
Field updated only when the field BUILD.PL.ENTRIES in the MI.PARAMETER application is set to ACCOUNTING.

When CATEG.ENTRY records with an ACCOUNTING.DATE are updated to Post Closing (PC) Database, this file would be updated with the IDs of such records. The Year and Month correspond to that of the earliest PC Database updated by the listed CATEG.ENTRY records.
System generated record. No input allowed.
Records in the file would be generated only when the field BUILD.PL.ENTRIES in the MI.PARAMETER application is set to ACCOUNTING.
